CosNaming::Name str2name (  const char *  namestr  ) 
 

Converts stringified name to naming service name.

Format for name: [<context_id>[.<context_kind>]/]*<object_id>[.<object_kind>]

E.g. foo, foo.bar, foo.bar/baz/qux, foo/bar/baz.qux
